content: Anyone know if there is anything in the v6.2 upgrade that would affect shibboleth? I upgraded our production site this past weekend and am seeing errors in the system log related to shibboleth (ie: " Unable to locate metadata for identity provider") and periodically folks can't login
Hmm. We're running 6.2 at Harvard and Shibboleth is working fine.
That error doesn't seem to be coming from Dataverse itself. Rather, it's coming from Shibboleth: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24261141/unable-to-locate-metadata-for-identity-provider

yea, sorry, i was just going to try to delete that post as I think it is something wrong with our shib config .. it is actually happening on our QA site and not production, so something got messed up there .. thanks for the response .. i'll close this :smile:
Deirdre Kirmis has marked this topic as resolved.
